title: Adaptive difficulty in VR
subtitle: Master thesis in Data Technology
description: A project to develop opponent bot models that can adjust to different player skill levels, to explore if this is a better skill match for players.

title: MyClimbingJournal
subtitle: Indoor climbing mobile app
description: A mobile app to help users log indoor climbing routes, follow their friends and keep updated on their favorite gyms. Work in progress for a commercial release.
